attributes.title: do not get!!
attributes.review: absolutely hate it, it made my phone mess up my overheating, freezing on me causing me to restart my phone, causing glitches, and it’s giving me viruses. plus once i downloaded the app (downloading took so long) it immediately crashed !!! take it down from the app store !! it would be horrible for anyone have to have this problem with their technology as well!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I’m so sad that the app does not work properly. I’m just trying to support my favorite president but the app keeps glitching. Doesn’t even deserve one star since it doesn’t work.😭

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible🤩
attributes.review: If you want to be the proud owner of a waste of space then download this app. Otherwise don’t waste your precious time or phone storage. Would give 0 stars if I could 🥰🥰

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app out of excitement to support our 🍊 but instead i was tricked. the app took 2 weeks and 4 days to download and once i opened it, it kept glitching and freezing and before i knew it my phone exploded. soon after my phone exploded it lit my whole house on fire and all my things were destroyed. it was so bad my own therapist told me he had no idea how to help.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: The app made my phone glitch so badly and I seriously needed it to stop and the only reason is if I deleted the app which I did after 6 hours of glitch

attributes.title: Worst app EVER FRICK TRUMP
attributes.review:
This app is the worst app. Mainly because it supports trump who is trash. He’s racist and disgusting. 🤮🤮🤮 This app gave me cancer and made me vomit. Delete this app, it’s no help at all. We should make a better app for Obama. I climbed out of my head
And watched myself implode
A thought without a body
Ought to be the shot to take a load off
My brain is poisoned
And I’m searching for the antidote
But every time I find it
My defenses scream “oh, no you don’t!”
Woah.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: Took forever to download and the app didn’t even work right. Wanted your phone number for some reason which is kind of weird I would never recommend this to any Trump supporters.

attributes.title: Almost died
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it sent people to kill me!! 😡😡😢😢 i almost died because of this app 😢😢 and trump doesn’t care that people can die from this app he sent these people to kill us 😢😢

attributes.title: Inaccurate Information
attributes.review: I wished to follow the campaign but was alarmed when all I saw was asked to put my information in. I do not consent to the GOP nor and political party to know my personal information. Oranges, away!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever I can’t turn my phone on I have to use my iPad to write the review this is horrible it’s just glitching it’s all this horrible stuff and I just can’t deal with it
